content: i couldn t help but experience a small thrill when crocheting this belt you see it s made with corn fiber yes corn it s luscious in every way i had wanted to try it out for so long when i started swatching with it i discovered that what i was doing looked deceptively like knitted i-cord and once i continued it looked like i had developed something that looked a lot like boning in a corset in my excitement the yarn literally flew off the hook making this belt i am certain that you will enjoy learning the new techniques offered in this pattern but the real beauty and interesting feature is definitely the a-maizing corn fiber enjoy >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
